You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesY Y] > &yopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Yopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D550.
  * `&yopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D56A.
